pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![Lint and Test Python üêç ](https://github.com/rte-france/SCL_Loader/workflows/Lint%20and%20Test%20Python%20%F0%9F%90%8D%20distribution%20%F0%9F%93%A6/badge.svg)# RTE - scl_loader## Installation```bashpip install scl_loader -U --user```## LicenceApache 2.0## VersionningUse [bumpversion](https://pypi.org/project/bumpversion/)example : ```bashbumpversion --current-version 1.0.0 minor setup.py scl_loader/__init__.py```
